'''v0.8.0 alpha build 5''' is the fourth build version released for [[Pocket Edition v0.8.0 alpha|Alpha 0.8.0]].

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Lava]]'''
* Now creates [[stone]] when it flows vertically into [[water]].
'''[[Flower]]s'''
* Position on the block is now randomized.

=== Items ===
'''[[Bone meal]]'''
* Now works like {{in|je}}.
* Can grow [[fern]]s and [[grass]] in Survival and Creative.
* [[Pumpkin]] and [[melon]] stems only grow by one when bone meal is used.
* [[Flower]]s now spawn other flowers when bone meal is used.
* {{Version exclusive}}: Grows [[sugar cane]] to maximum height.

=== Non-mob entities ===
'''[[Minecart]]s'''
* Now ride smoother.
